State: 1Length includes approaches and connecting links which were financed as an integral part of the toll project.  The length of toll bridges includes approach sections which may be used toll free by local residents.
2Multiple structures at a single facility are counted as one bridge or tunnel. Does not include bridges or tunnels that are part of roadway segments reported under Toll road mileage.
3Excludes ferries providing exclusive service for passengers or freight as opposed to vehicles.
NOTE: Totals reflect crossings between states as one facility or ferry route, including 33 bridges, 2 tunnels, and 28 ferry routes. Data as of January 1, 2013.

SOURCE: U.S. Department of Transportation, Federal Highway Administration, Office of Highway Policy Information, Toll Facilities in the United States, table T-1, available at www.fhwa.dot.gov/policyinformation/tollpage as of June 2014.
